item.title: Nvidia Lag Fix KDE Plasma 5/6 on X11
item.description: Hello readers of this post! Some of you that have a high refresh-rate with a second monitor at a different refresh rate, let’s say 60hz may have seen some stutters or lags when launching apps like System Settings and may also have seen that the windows does not move at 144fps. I managed to fix this issue by merging multiple solutions found on multiple reddit posts and on forums of KDE Plasma.
